phasing_details.phase_detail: change of use of takeaway (sui generis) on ground floor to C3 (residential unit) and made part of the residential unit on first floor.

description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extension, increased height of basement, erection of a rear roof extension with two front roof windows, air source heat pump, bin stores, cycle stores, change of use of the ground floor and basement from takeaway and store (Use Class Sui Generis) and above flat to a single dwelling house (Use Class C3).
